description: NEW DELHI: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) on Wedenesday conducted raids at the premises of Maharashtra Congress leader Baba Siddique, Rafique Maqbul Qureshi and others in connection to their alleged role in the Mumbai slum rehabilitation scam.
title: ED raids Congress leader Baba Siddique and associates in Mumbai slum rehabilitation scam
title_page: ED raids Congress leader Baba Siddique and associates in Mumbai slum rehabilitation scam - NewsHub
text:
NEW DELHI: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) on Wedenesday conducted raids at the premises of Maharashtra Congress leader Baba Siddique, Rafique Maqbul Qureshi and others in connection to their alleged role in the Mumbai slum rehabilitation scam.
Siddique, a former Bandra MLA, and his associates were named in an FIR filed by the Mumbai police to investigate a Rs 108 crore money laundering case involving a slum rehab project in suburban Bandra.
ED officials said the raids are being conducted on at least half a dozen locations in the Maharashtra capital, including that of a builder. A criminal case has been registered against Siddique and others under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) based on the local police FIR.
Source: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
